= Requirements =

 # Java Runtime Environment (Get it free at: [http://java.com/ java.com])
<br>
----
<br>







= How to run =

== Windows ==

Double click on jwarframe.jar

== Linux ==

in terminal run:<br>
cd to jWarframe directory and run:
<pre>java -jar jwarframe.jar</pre>
<br>
----
<br>





= Settings location =

Replace *USERNAME* with your username

==Windows==
XP: C:\Documents and Settings\*USERNAME*\.jwarframe\<br>
Vista: C:\Users\*USERNAME*\.jwarframe<br>

==Linux==
/home/*USERNAME*/.jwarframe/

==Mac==
~/Library/Preferences/jWarframe<br>
<br>
----
<br>





= jWarframe will not run =

== Solutions 1 ==
Re-download jWarframe (jWarframe can get corrupted doing download)

 # [https://forums.warframe.com/index.php?/topic/221940-jwarframe-alpha-6-alert-and-invasion-notifier-for-winlinuxmac/ Download]
 # Unzip
 # Double click on jwarframe.jar

== Solutions 2 ==
Re-install java (old versions of java are bad)

 # Uninstall all versions of java ([http://www.java.com/en/download/uninstall.jsp help])
 # Download the latest version of [http://www.java.com/en/download/index.jsp java]
 # Install java ([http://www.java.com/en/download/help/windows_manual_download.xml help])
<br>
----
<br>

 # Instructions on how to reproduce the bug<br>
